remarks: The powers of the element ` 1 ` give a ring homomorphism from ` ZZ ` to a ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
statement:
mulgghm2.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
mulgghm2.f $e |- F = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) $.
mulgrhm.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mulgrhm $p |- ( R e. Ring -> F e. ( ZZring RingHom R ) ) $.
$d .1. n $.
$d .x. n $.
$d R n $.
